title: Mosaic-like gene deletion and duplication pattern shaping the immune system discovered

title_detail.value: Mosaic-like gene deletion and duplication pattern shaping the immune system discovered

summary: A team of researchers has developed a computational tool for analyzing genetic changes related to the immune system. With this new development, the onset of many autoimmune diseases, such as multiple sclerosis and celiac disease, infectious diseases, such as hepatitis C and flu, and various forms of cancer may be predicted.
